thread.title: Kimberly-Clark tops Street 3Q forecasts - Yahoo Finance
thread.title_full: Kimberly-Clark tops Street 3Q forecasts - Yahoo Finance

author: yahoo
title: Kimberly-Clark tops Street 3Q forecasts - Yahoo Finance
text:
DALLAS (AP) _ Kimberly-Clark Corp. (KMB) on Wednesday reported third-quarter profit of $517 million.
On a per-share basis, the Dallas-based company said it had net income of $1.41. Earnings, adjusted for restructuring costs and non-recurring costs, came to $1.51 per share.
The results surpassed Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of five analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $1.49 per share.
The maker of consumer products such as Huggies diapers and Kleenex tissue posted revenue of $4.72 billion in the period, also surpassing Street forecasts. Four analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $4.65 billion.
Kimberly-Clark expects full-year earnings in the range of $5.70 to $5.80 per share.
Kimberly-Clark shares have risen 1.5 percent since the beginning of the year, while the Standard & Poor's 500 index has fallen slightly more than 1 percent. The stock has climbed 8.5 percent in the last 12 months.
